explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of deep reinforcement learning methods, which are a subset of machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions using deep reinforcement learning methods like policy gradient (PG) and deep deterministic policy gradient (DDPG) for stock portfolio investments.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep reinforcement learning, which is a branch of deep learning, to develop models for stock portfolio investments.
explanations.neural network: The paper constructs a neural network framework as part of the model development process.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper mentions using a convolution neural network (CNN) along with a Squeeze-and-Excitation Block (SE Block) in the neural network framework.
explanations.CNN: The paper uses a convolutional neural network (CNN) as part of the neural network framework for the model.
